nodes.text: Mobile Medical Unit 4-077 was a mobile hospital of the Corellian Defense Force.

In 1 ABY, the unit was stationed in the Corellian wilderness for a big training exercise. During this exercise, criminal lowlifes repeatedly tried to steal their medical supplies. When a crate of ion beamers was stolen by smugglers, the unit scraped money out of their orotay-filter replenishment fund and hired a spacer to find the smugglers, retrieve the crate and "give their base the Alderaan treatment".
The Mobile Medical Unit 4-077 is has a parallel with the 4077th Mobile Army Surgical Hospital, the setting of the novel, movie, and television series M*A*S*H.
